author: Christine Rendon For Dailymail.Com
title: Emily Ratajkowski rocks plunging plum dress | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Emily's floorlength dress flashed her legs and the plunging neckline put her cleavage on full display. Stealing the show! No matter what she wore, there's no doubt the famously gorgeous super star was the center of attention on the red carpet She wore her brunette tresses down in loose waves and brought out her brown eyes with a smoky coat of eye shadow. Emily was a natural in front of the cameras she posed this way and that, showing off her gym-honed arms and legs to full effect. Having risen to prominence in Robin Thicke's music video for Blurred Lines, Emily had since become a household name in the fashion world - best known for her scantily-clad displays in order to show off her model physique. Picture perfect! Ratajkowski was a natural in front of the cameras she posed this way and that, showing off her gym-honed arms and legs to full effect Last month, the star even revealed to her 10million-plus followers on Instagram that she had landed the cover of Vogue España. The starring role was her very first for the Spanish publication and her second cover for the fashion bible internationally. Proving she has multiple strings to her bow however, the brunette has also turned her hand to acting. She starred alongside Zac Efron in We Are Your Friends back in 2015, before appearing on hit Netflix comedy Easy late last year. Hello gorgeous: She wore her brunette tresses down in loose waves and brought out her brown eyes with a smoky coat of eye shadow Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
